changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE mocks ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL, route TEXT NOT NULL, method_id INT NOT NULL, response_content_type_id INT NOT NULL, status_code INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 200, query_params TEXT, textual_response_id INT, binary_response_id INT, created_at INT NOT NULL, updated_at INT, deleted_at INT, PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT http_method_fk FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES http_methods (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION NOT VALID, CONSTRAINT response_content_type_fk FOREIGN KEY (response_content_type_id) REFERENCES response_content_types (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION NOT VALID, CONSTRAINT textual_response_fk FOREIGN KEY (textual_response_id) REFERENCES http_methods (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION NOT VALID, CONSTRAINT binary_response_fk FOREIGN KEY (binary_response_id) REFERENCES http_methods (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION NOT VALID );
